channel.title: Anyway to fix these glitches?
channel.description: I got some annoying glitches in my server. They are: 1. If you use prayer, no-one will see the hits or talk. 2. If you are close to kq you can't see your talk, and if you hit kq you can't see your hits. 3. People can attack slayer monsters with mage, anyway to fix this? I would hope someone could awnser.

item.title: Anyway to fix these glitches?
item.dc:creator: @Eleret Eleret
item.description:
@Eleret wrote:

Okay, thanks for those 2 awnsers. I meaned people attack with magic some slayer monsters, like dark beasts, and they would need 100 slayer, but they can still attack to the beast with 1 slayer, if they use mage.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyway to fix these glitches?
item.dc:creator: @Reforced _Reforced
item.description:
@Reforced wrote:

Prayer only works on 317 clients, so if your using silabsoft or moparscape, it won’t let you see what people are saying.

Kalphite queen has protect from range and magic on all the time, so since it’s using prayer, you can’t see it’s HP.

Why wouldn’t you want people to be able to attack slayer monsters with magic?

Read full topic

item.title: Anyway to fix these glitches?
item.dc:creator: @Eleret Eleret
item.description:
@Eleret wrote:

I got some annoying glitches in my server. They are:

  1. If you use prayer, no-one will see the hits or talk.
  2. If you are close to kq you can’t see your talk, and if you hit kq you can’t see your hits.
  3. People can attack slayer monsters with mage, anyway to fix this?
    I would hope someone could awnser.

Read full topic
